text:
This is because none of the 'graphics' related DOM API's are
available unless you build the associated rendering tree.
In particular it's hard to imagine what it could return
from 'getScreenCTM' when no mappint to screen coords has
been established.

I will reinterpret this as a desire for an enhancement to
the error thrown.  It should point out that no graphics
structures have been built.

Reassigning all open bugs to the development list.
Sorry for the mass mailing.
